attributes.action: we would like to send a protest to burma.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we would like to gather thousands of people to send a protest to burma telling them to release Aung San Suu Kyi and make her their leader, as she should be.

rejection.details: Your petition must make a point about government policy. If you would like the government to change its policy on Burma, please state how.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
